title: Electronic Store Management System
description: The Management system works as a full web application with a perfect sync of UI and Database.

title: Weather Web App
description: This web application is a weather condition tracker that uses the Open Weather API to fetch the current weather data using the device's location.

title: Book-Website
description: This is a responsive and visually engaging book-themed website with dynamic layouts built using Bootstrap which has interactive interface.

title: To-Do List
description: This web application is functional, practical and even more interactive with the UI components making this more user-friendly using React-Js.
